segments.text: I glance at the kitchen scene and see the sink overflowing steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the edge, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on drying her plate, foot in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad she's missing the danger building around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on that shaky stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so small and vulnerable, about to lose balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be really painful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, her little hand raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent fun might end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view outside highlights how fragile this moment is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching this potential tragedy unfold unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel in her hand seems symbolic of routine gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor things, all of them unaware of the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR
